Title: Modelling the Human Cortex in Three Dimensions
Abstract: © 2018 Elsevier LtdIn cognitive neuroscience, brain-behaviour relationships are usually mapped onto a 2D cortical sheet. Cortical layers are a critical but often ignored third dimension of human cortical function. Improved resolution has put us on the threshold of beginning to image human cognition in three dimensions.
